title: Stepbrother Unmasked
description: Natasha has spent the last eight years secretly and hopelessly in love with her stepbrother, Bradley Owens.A few nights before Halloween, Natasha and her best friend attend a masked ball honoring the success of Bradley's company as well as the expansion of it.But as CEO of the company, Bradley is set to move to London in two days to oversee the start-up of the new office.Natasha knows that if she doesn't admit her feelings to him tonight, she may never get another chance.Stepbrother Unmasked is a steamy, standalone short story with no cliffhangers and a happy ending. This title was previously listed under a different author name.
author: Lana Walch
